text:
I like this idea as well, and #two-minute-week sounds at least fine ;) As for the problem with summaries vs progress-updates, the format could give even more structure: for example the first 30s as a "recap from scratch", the rest of the video for weekly progress. For bigger changes in project direction or progress the intro can be re-made over time or otherwisd reused the following week.

Sadly there is no more support for cards to skip to a position in a YouTube video, but a custom player could fix that...

elements.text:

For bigger changes in project direction or progress the intro can be re-made over time or otherwisd reused the following week.

Sadly there is no more support for cards to skip to a position in a YouTube video, but a custom player could fix that...

text: Hah, sorry I did this a couple of times when I decided to post links and follow up with more info, my thoughts are I wanted people to see top level context of the link, next time I'll edit the post if I want to add instead of following up

elements.text: Hah, sorry I did this a couple of times when I decided to post links and follow up with more info, my thoughts are I wanted people to see top level context of the link, next time I'll edit the post if I want to add instead of following up

text: Maybe it *is* a good idea to have the updates posted all on the same day of the week (a time-zone-friendly 24h window). This induces pressure for people to post things that a “post any time” model wouldn’t.

elements.text: a good idea to have the updates posted all on the same day of the week (a time-zone-friendly 24h window). This induces pressure for people to post things that a “post any time” model wouldn’t.

text: I'm fine doing it in a low effort way. When I joined it was impossible for me to share what I was working on because it was all job stuff that wasn't public, so I had to vaguely talk about my philosophy and interest.  Now I'm working on some small, not super interesting but useful to me, tools that I can share semi-regular progress screen shots. Maybe I'll share sketches as well. I don't post in feedback because I don't want feedback on anything I'm working on. It's all personal and only really needs to serve me
